content.title: Anomaly Rule Spike and Drop Detection (based on 30 days data)

content.query:
Anomalies
| where AnomalyTemplateName == '{Template}'
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)

content.title: User Anomalies Detection Per day wise Trend

content.query:
Anomalies
| where AnomalyTemplateName contains "bruteforce"
| extend AbnormalFailedCount = tostring(AnomalyReasons[0].Value)
| extend Historic_counts_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AnomalyReasons[0].TypicalObservations)).["Historic counts"])
| where isnotempty(UserName)
|extend User= tostring(split(UserName,"\\").[1])
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), AnomalyTemplateName

seriesLabelSettings.seriesName: (Preview) Attempted user account bruteforce per logon type
seriesLabelSettings.label: Attempted user account bruteforce per logon type

seriesLabelSettings.seriesName: (Preview) Attempted user account bruteforce per failure reason
seriesLabelSettings.label: Attempted user account bruteforce per failure reason

content.query:
Anomalies
| where AnomalyTemplateName contains "bruteforce"
| extend AbnormalFailedCount = tostring(AnomalyReasons[0].Value)
| extend Historic_counts_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AnomalyReasons[0].TypicalObservations)).["Historic counts"])
| where isnotempty(UserName)
|extend User= tostring(split(UserName,"\\").[1])
| extend ExpectedCount = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(AnomalyDetails.Observables))[0].TypicalObservations)).["Expected count"])
| summarize make_set(strcat(TimeGenerated," :: ",Description)), make_set(AnomalyTemplateName) by TimeGenerated, UserName, User, AbnormalFailedCount, ExpectedCount, Historic_counts_, Score
| extend des1 = tostring(set_[0])
| extend des2 = tostring(set_[1])
| extend des3 = tostring(set_[2])
|join
(SecurityEvent 
| summarize make_set(WorkstationName), make_set(IpAddress) by  Account)on $left.UserName== $right.Account
| project TimeGenerated, UserName,AbnormalFailedCount,ExpectedCount,set_WorkstationName, set_IpAddress, User, Historic_counts_, Score, des1, des2, des3
content.title: User attempted bruteforce Anomalies Detected

content.json:
{SelectedUserName}

Abnormal raise in failure count is being observed for the user **{SelectedUserName}**


**Failure Count Descripencies:** As per past log analysis failure count is expected as **{SelectedExpectedCount}**. But failure count is detected as **{SelectedAbnormalFailedCount}**. And Anamoly score is **{SelectedScore}**


**Historic Count:** {SelectedHistoricCount}

**Anomaly Destails Detected: ** Below are the Details for Anomaly Detection on

{Selecteddes1}

{Selecteddes2}

{Selecteddes3}

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in ("4625", "4624")
| where Account contains '{SelectedUser}'
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), Activity
//| summarize  count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), Computer, Activity, IpAddress, WorkstationName, LogonTypeName, Account,TargetDomainName, TargetUserName, LogonProcessName, Status,SubStatus, FailureReason
content.title: Authentication Failure &  Success Count Trend for User

seriesLabelSettings.seriesName: 4624 - An account was successfully logged on.
4625 - An account failed to log on.

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Account contains '{SelectedUser}' or TargetUserName contains '{SelectedUser}'
| summarize count() by Activity, WorkstationName
| order by count_ desc
content.title: All  Activities Detected for the User

content.json:
Investigation & Response

1. Check the Table and Click on the UserName to get Authentication Trend and Other activities for the selected User.
2. Check the trend and count for the selected User.

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct == "PAN-OS"
| where isnotempty(DeviceAction)
| where DeviceAction in ("{Action}")
|summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)

CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor contains "palo"
| where isnotempty( IndicatorThreatType)
| summarize count() by IndicatorThreatType, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
content.title: PaloAlto Anomalies Detection by ThreatType

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor contains "palo"
| where DeviceAction in ("deny", "drop", "drop-packet")
| where isnotempty( IndicatorThreatType)
| where DeviceCustomString4 == "outside"
| summarize count() by MaliciousIP
| order by count_ desc
| take 5
content.title: Top Inbound Malicious IP Hits

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor contains "palo"
| where DeviceAction in ("deny", "drop", "drop-packet")
| where isnotempty( IndicatorThreatType)
| where DeviceCustomString4 == "outside"
| summarize count() by MaliciousIP, MaliciousIPCountry,  ThreatConfidence, IndicatorThreatType
| order by count_ desc
| take 5
content.title: TOP 10 Inbound malicious IP Details

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor contains "palo"
| where DeviceAction in ("deny", "drop", "drop-packet")
| where isnotempty( IndicatorThreatType)
| where DeviceCustomString4 == "outside"
| summarize count() by MaliciousIPCountry
| order by count_ desc
| take 20
content.title: Country Wise  Malicious IP Hits

parameters.name: Action
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct == "PAN-OS"
| where isnotempty(DeviceAction)
| summarize by DeviceAction

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct == "PAN-OS"
| where DeviceAction == "All" or DeviceAction in({Action})
| where isnotempty(DeviceAction)
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), DeviceAction

parameters.name: URLType
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Zscaler"
| where DeviceAction == "Blocked"
| summarize by DeviceCustomString2

parameters.name: Action
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Zscaler"
| where DeviceAction in ("Allowed", "Blocked")
| summarize by  DeviceAction

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Zscaler"
| where  "{Action:label}" == "All" or DeviceAction in ({Action})
| where  "{URLType:label}" == "All" or DeviceCustomString2 in ({URLType})
| summarize count() by URLcat = DeviceCustomString2, DeviceAction, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by count_ desc
content.title: URL Category Wise  Traffic Trend

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSWeblog"
| where  "{Action:label}" == "All" or DeviceAction in ({Action})
| where DeviceCustomString2 in ({URLType})
| summarize make_set(RequestContext), dcount(SourceUserName),count() by  DestinationHostName, URLCategory= DeviceCustomString2, DeviceAction
| top 20 by count_
| join  kind= leftouter ( 
_GetWatchlist('CrowdStrike_High_Domain') ) on $left.DestinationHostName == $right.indicator
| project DestinationHostName, DeviceAction, URLCategory,malicious_confidence, malware_families, SUserCnt=dcount_SourceUserName, count_
content.title: Top Domains  Hits on Zscaler

content.query:
EmailEvents
| extend EmailDeliveryAction = strcat ( DeliveryLocation, " - ", DeliveryAction) 
| summarize count() by  EmailDeliveryAction
| where EmailDeliveryAction !contains "Unknown"
content.title: Email Delivery Action

content.query:
EmailEvents
| extend EmailDeliveryAction = strcat ( DeliveryLocation, " - ", DeliveryAction) 
| where EmailDeliveryAction =='{PickEmailDeliveryAction}'
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 4h)
content.title: Email Delivery Action Trend

content.query:
EmailEvents
| where EmailDirection == "Inbound"
| extend EmailDeliveryAction = strcat ( DeliveryLocation, " - ", DeliveryAction)
| where EmailDeliveryAction == '{PickEmailDeliveryAction}' 
| summarize dCnt_Recipient=dcount(RecipientEmailAddress),dCnt_Sub=dcount(Subject),  count() by SenderFromAddress, EmailDeliveryAction
| order by count_ desc
| take 20
content.title: Dellivery Action Wise TOP Sender Details for Inbound Email

content.query:
let domain= dynamic(["vistracorp.com","ambitenergy.com","AMBITENERGY.COM","txu.onmicrosoft.com","txu.com","vistraenergy.com","txuer.net",
"luminant.com","Luminant.com","criusenergy.com","AmbitEnergyInc.onmicrosoft.com","TXU.com","dynegy.com","tceh.net","site24x7.com","service-now.com","box.com", "microsoft.com"]);
EmailEvents
|where SenderFromDomain !in (domain)
|where isnotempty( SenderFromAddress)
|where RecipientEmailAddress has_any(domain)
|summarize  count()by SenderFromAddress, RecipientEmailAddress, EmailActionPolicy,EmailAction, DeliveryAction, DeliveryLocation, AttachmentCount
|where count_ >100
|order by count_
content.title: More than 100 mails from same external Sender to Recipient

content.query:
Anomalies
| where AnomalyTemplateName == "(Preview) Suspicious volume of logins to user account"
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)

content.json:
Description

Identity Protection uses the learnings Microsoft has acquired from their position in organizations with Azure AD, the consumer space with Microsoft Accounts.
Risk detections in Azure AD Identity Protection include any identified suspicious actions related to user accounts in the directory.
Identity Protection identifies risks of many types, including:
Anonymous IP address use
Atypical travel
Malware linked IP address
Unfamiliar sign-in properties
Leaked credentials
Password spray.

content.query:
AADUserRiskEvents
|join 
AADRiskyUsers on $left.UserDisplayName== $right.UserDisplayName
|summarize by UserPrincipalName, OperationName1, IpAddress, RiskDetail,  RiskLevel,  RiskState, tostring(Location),Activity,tostring(AdditionalInfo), RiskEventType

let timeframe= 15d;
SecurityIncident
| where Status == "New"
|where TimeGenerated >= ago(timeframe)
|summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by IncidentNumber
|summarize  count() by bin(TimeGenerated,1d)
content.title: Incident Spike in Sentinel

content.query:
let startdate = 15d;
let enddate = 1d;
SecurityIncident
| where TimeGenerated > ago(enddate)
|where Status == "New"
|summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by IncidentNumber
|summarize TodayCnt=count() by Title
| join (SecurityIncident
| where TimeGenerated > ago(startdate) and TimeGenerated < ago(enddate)
| where Status == "New"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by IncidentNumber
| summarize  count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), Title
| summarize Maxcount=max(count_), Mincount= min(count_) by Title
) on Title
| extend AnomalyDetection = case(TodayCnt > Maxcount, "Spike Detected", TodayCnt < (Mincount*0.5),  "Drop Detected","No Detection")
| project Title, AnomalyDetection,TodayCnt, Maxcount, Mincount
content.title: Sentinel  Incident Detection

content.query:
let timeframe= 15d;
SecurityIncident
| where Status == "New"
|where TimeGenerated >= ago(timeframe)
|where Title == '{rulename}'
|summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by IncidentNumber
|summarize  count() by bin(TimeGenerated,1d)
content.title: Incident Detection Trend
